data.text: Very disappointing. I thought this would come in handy. After allowing ALL access to ALL my files, that was it. I never got past that point. I tried rebooting my phone, I tried closing out so the windows and restarting the app, but it won't restart. It starts at that last part........... frustrating! Will be deleting the app.

This app, PDF Pro, was the reason why miscellaneous ads would pop up on my phone. Neither I or my husband recall installing or using the app. Instead of deleting the app, my husband decided to check all open windows to determine where the ad originated. The app has been uninstalled.

Misleading App. FB Ad showed scanning plants to find best way to treat your plants...didn't say anything about wanting full access to my files on my cell...and does nothing the Ad on FB said. REMOVING

Malware. Pops up intrusive ads OUTSIDE OF THE APP. If you are here because you want to uninstall the app because of the malicious and extremely intrusive ads, click "Flag as inappropriate" in the top right and choose the option related to "device and data".

DONT GET THIS APP. IT WILL MAKE ADS POP UP. I will be on anything even my main screen and this app will swap the screen to browser also bring up different ads. This is frustrating and stupid. I let it go for a few weeks to see if it was other apps that caused this issue.... Nope. It was this app. Also the reason I got the app was bc it was advertised as a wall stud finder which is a lie. Advertised was on Facebook. U ppl are disgusting. U knew better
This is not a voice translator, just seems to want access to files on my phone. Deleted app after one minute.

It won't let me keep on watching the whole story from the beginning to the end. How's come I can't watch it from the beginning to the end. I did what they say to do an I live these stories an I can't get it to stay on an start over to the finished

What a scam! I saw this advertised on Facebook and it's for being able to see inside of walls which I found very useful for my trade. So I downloaded it and after it asked for access to all my files on my phone it felt suspect as hell. Then I come to the comments and it's about reading coins. Don't get this app!
Junk, forces pop up ads even while not using app. Had to get IT person I know to find it was this app as it's icon is sneaky with just a question mark. Do not install

ENDLESS Advertisement Pop-Ups!!!! I thought my Samsung Internet Browser was causing random pop-ups advertisements but I discovered the "PDF Pro-Reader and Maker App" to be the culprit. I cannot remember installing this App, but after removing/uninstalling this App my advertisement pop-ups were eradicated.
I like having this kinda device for my collection, makes it so much easier n faster to read and log.

This is malware. It forces the browser to display advertisements outside of the application (aggressively). If you have this app, uninstall it. If you are thinking of downloading it, don't. It also flagged by Kaspersky as adware.

The only reason I downloaded this app was to scan and find out the value of my coin collection. Well, there are no instructions/hints on how to use it, AT ALL!! 🤨🧐 99.9% sure that I'll have to uninstall and install an app that does what it advertised it would do. At the very least, I need an app that is user friendly.
I did not bother to actually open when it gave the user agreement there was none for some strange reason I decided to look I never look but I did and all is said was I am not allowed on that page
MALWARE!!!! BEWARE!!! FAKE!!!!! Only downloaded cause it showed that you could "auto tune" your voice recordings. Wanted to just have fun, but just a SPAM app.

Asking that it be able to access all your files is extremely suspect and very unnecessary given its a specific app to read coins,therefore unrelated to anything else whatsoever, this is making me want to Uninstaller it to be safe!!!!
Easy enough for me but was hoping to be able to scan my coin collection and still want to but not sure how? Thanks ahead of time need some help figuring it out.
The adds for this app ate very misleading this is just a PDF app which most people already have on their phone. They make ypu think this is a song improvement app. IT IS NOT. IM UNINSTALLING NOW
I think it's insane for you to want Control of all my files and you can delete them without my permission. No no no!

DO NOT INSTALL THIS USELESS APP!!! The countless pop-ups (mostly ADs) are VERY misleading and can happen at any time; day and night- no matter what you're doing on your phone! This APP is not as it's advertised to be; if you have it, uninstall it asap! . . . Shameful!

All the reason I give one star. When I try to get and get into it but I can't sing the music There's an app for music. It's very dicey and weird, I advise you guys don't try childish cause it's just tricky. It's weird, it's don't do music. The app look kind of cool to do music. Oh well, we'll do it. But it's not so don't try this. I give it one star. It's not worth it. It lame and stupid. Don't get it. Don't try it.

This app is intrusive, beware. It hijacked my Samsung browser and the Chrome browser. I kept getting pop-ups all times of day and night no matter what I was doing. It was pushing me to websites to buy something I wasn't even interested in. Google didn't even pick it up that it's malware. Do not download!
Misleading. Doesn't look like it's a U.S. coin app at all. And other reviews are not good either
BEWARE **This app said ti was for finding studs in a wall. Another on her side it was for reading coins.. I think is just a cam to get your info..

It claims it also has a digital scale option on Facebook ads but it doesn't. And it will also advertise unwanted ads on your home screen on its own when you unlock your screen just like the Amazon tablet does and it disguises itself with a fake settings icon at the very top of it's window as its your settings that is doing it when you go through your open windows but it's really this app causing all the problems itself. It's fake and it will take over your phone with unwanted ads popping up

This is a terrible app that will force Samsung Internet to show advertisement pop-ups out of nowhere on your phone. The app even hid its apk name in the activity logs associated with launching Samsung Internet in the adb dev tool on my computer! That just shows how sneaky and malicious the app is. Juding by the reviews here too, it seems like many people were deceived into downloading this app through misleading Facebook ads. It's just a malicious adware PDF app! Never download this app!

It comes with unwanted Pop up ads which display themselves over whatever app you are using. I was going crazy trying to get rid of them. I read the reviews on this app and after deleting it it solved my problem. Do not download this app.

It's a really neat app, unless you plan on not saving any to go back in to finish later. It's supposed to let you do that and all my saved logos show up in the saved section, but every time I open one, the only thing that saved is the background. Very frustrating and disappointing considering how fun the app is otherwise.
Quit advertising this is a auto tune singing app. It's nothing of the sort.
Just Kool all the way round an fun too see 😁 and recreate old new things .
False advertising click bait. This is not what was advertised
Sux... does not do what I downloaded it to do, and I am not sure what it does do. Going to delete less than 30 minutes after downloaded
This app doesn't do what it said it does. It just wants access to my photos.. doesn't explain how it works or how to care for a plant like it advertised...

Do not download this this will put malware on your phone. It will keep sending you ads for everything. They will pop up at the most inappropriate time. You probably didn't even know what this was and download it you can't even get any information about it. If something is wrong with your phone and it's not acting right take this app off.
Yeah, completely misleading add, then needs access to every file on your phone. Deleted.
ITS BEING ADVERTISED AS AN AUTO TUNE SINGING APP!!! I FEEL AS IF I MAY HAVE BECOME VICTIM TO ALLOW ACCESS TO MY PHONE AND STORAGE. IM REPORTING THIS
The very cause and culprit of ads popping up out of nowhere. Somehow installed itself to my device. Only regret I have is not being able to give it zero stars.
So annoying with all the pop ups constantly. Even when you're not using the app. Wish I would have read the reviews before installing the app
horrible app. puts ads all over your device. even here when I try to evaluate this app. WORTHLESS
The promised stud finder is no where to be found. This was the only reason I installed it. Useless app. Unistalling.
There are ads for everything you try to do and I can't figure out nothing on it. There is no help button.
If I could give no stars I would this app is a waste of time does nothing what it says in 5 min all it takes garbage
This app does not value coins like it advertised. Spyware??
Uninstalling, misleading ad for this app on social media. Kinda disappointing.
I clicked on an advertisement for an auto-tune app and this is what downloaded

It was advertised as a wall stud finder, not whatever this is. After downloading, you'll see for yourself why to delete this app and not use it. It asks for unnecessary permissions, which is a pathetic invasion of ones privacy.
Constant pop ups. It took me awhile to figure out this app was where it was coming. Beware it will definitely infect your phone. Once I deleted this app. No more pop ups
Pop us like crazy!! Couldn't use my phone without forced pop ups of ads. Kept running in the background and using up my battery.

You forced me to open and ad before I could even see your product. You could have waited.... but just had to ram an ad down my throat. Closed ad and deleted product without even trying. Good luck in the future.

very easy to use i love that there is Beauty options worth using, Some don't. And that is Unfortunate. But this One was so easy to Navigate and Apply. another thing I Really loved was the option for Gradient text, and also making the Shapes gradient As well,

This is the best app I found for logo making. There are different categories that helps alot. But the reason I am giving 4 stars is that there should be a edit button in 'My work' so we can make some changes even after saving it. One more thing there should be a redo button while making a logo.
This is one of those Facebook scams. Almost lured into their trick, but permission to access files on phone caught my eye. Be careful!
Facebook advertised this as like an auto tune app. Finding out it's just a PDF app that wants complete access to ALL your files! Instant uninstall!

BEWARE..0 stars ..Ads were popping up continously..I try to text interrupted by ads ..drove me nuts for weeks ..finally figured out it must be this app.uninstalled problem solved!! Good riddance Worst app ever!!
Add after each photo you edit that plays very loud through phone and then it sends you directly to Google Play for a download. Not worth it.

Very deceptive the ads are crazy they just pop up anywhere anytime if you're on line they are truly aggressive with these ads for the longest I didn't even know where they were coming from predatory app leave it alone
Very heavy distracting ads.
The beginning it was great it sound like a good movie on it if I could see it

This app is super excellent,it provides many free features while design a logo and it also has good font styles and colors compared to other logomaker apps,its easy to download and installation, it's also user friendly I can recommend all of you to download it
Horrible. Totally was not a coin identifier! Lies
Read the extra storage carefully.they want access to all files and your authorizing them to handle delete etc. Not happening!!!
Just new to this hoping real an works when I see progression all rate better
Not what it said ot would be.. and full of ads

Don't download this app. All it did is giving me problems on my phone. You will get redirect every time you try to open your search browser. I'm telling you it's no good and you been warned about this.

All this app does is bog your phone down with stupid ads! I have no idea how it got on my phone in the first place. Once I figured out this was the culprit of the ads, I unistalled it and no more ads bombarding my phone.
A fake program that does not examine coins. A trick in advertising a program that examines coins. It contains many one-star rating advertisements, but I rate it by 5 👎👎👎👎👎

The app doesn't match up with what the video ads and it is a fake thing it is not about a satellite 📡 that takes pictures and you can see anything that has to do with satellite it's just a marking for you to put on files and stupid this is a fake ad it's all scam
Makes it easier to check your money to see if it's worth money or rare coins to see value .
It sucks keeps popping up on phone won't go away
Weired app, want to access to all files🙄 just uninstalled
No Directions. Don't do anything. Like it says see thru wall. I Install it. After 5 minutes. Junk app.
I like using PDF Pro it has everything in one physical place and you can create different files and you can also use it offline on reader
Deceitful advertising. Its suppose to be a wall scanner to find studs, plumbing, and electrical wires
This page are awesome you can have fun you can enjoy yourself laugh laugh away
Can't open the next one after I've downloaded the app
Very useful and easy to use
Kept opening up ads and different web pages. Once I uninstalled, I have had no more issues. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
I expect most of the positive reviews are bs. This can delete any files on my phone or connected devices? Why would I allow that.
This is a scam app. Advertised as a stud finder or coin collector app and is NOT. 100% Scam and all the 5 stars are fake. Android allowing this is really odd
It's not good. They wants me to download all garbages that I don't want
Wants all your info out of your phone. No thanks
Why would you make an ad for one thing and entice people to download something else? Who the hell wants a PDF reader with pop ups?
Not an auto tune app at all

**ADWARE** Advertised as for coin collectors but obviously a SCAM and came with ADWARE that would cause my internet to keep opening on its own to websites advertising ad blockers, virus protection, loans and other useless things. DON'T DOWNLOAD
It is easy to learn and share it with your family and friends.
I love it but I need My face please someone help me next time I'm not letting my grandkids play on my phone
Didn’t realize how easy this app was to use! Compared to other apps I've used this is the best!
No Expedia Just wanted to check the prior
Fake ads on Facebook. Not the advertisement for this app. Sad pathetic scam. Thanks... -5 stars
Gave me a virus on my phone now ads pop up all day
Great to keep all my files stored up.
Having to learn this is interesting 🤔 .. figuring it out
Once downloaded I got spam pop ups and couldn't even use my phone! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
Scam , Doesnt see through walls . it wants access to all your files and can change them wothout your knowledge.
I have not received one piece of benefit and now being asked to rate it

With the 20 other free sites that each give you 20 times more to work with why download a lazily put together money grab of an App when it has zero value to start? Unless this app version was 5 years old or more its actually an insult.
Great App , More than convenient!!
Do not download, add will pop up on phone when not in any app whatsoever. Beware! Shame on you app makers.
There are too many pop-ups before you can use this app Had to uninstall.
no aI just gets permision to read ALL of your files and converts files to pdf most likly a virus
